description: This file sets up a basic agent with memory, storage, and a playground interface, then runs a web server for the agent playground.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific configurations.

classes.name: AgentMemory
classes.description: Handles the memory component for the agent.

classes.name: PgMemoryDb
classes.description: PostgreSQL database interface for agent memory.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model interface for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Provides a web interface for interacting with agents.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the web application instance for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Runs the web server for the playground app.
